commands.tooltip: run knex migrations in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_node_1 npm run knex:migrate

commands.tooltip: run knex seeds in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_node_1 npm run knex:seed

commands.tooltip: run gulp setipIndices command in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_node_1 npm run gulp:indices

commands.tooltip: run codecept tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_nodetest_1 npm run test:cept

commands.tooltip: run mocha api tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_nodetest_1 npm run test:api

commands.tooltip: run mocha unit tests in docker container
commands.command: docker exec submithub-clone-server_nodetest_1 npm run test:unit
